wikipedia_page.main: James Richmond (22 March 1858 – 13 January 1898) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward.

response: * 22 March – James Richmond (d. 1898), Scotland international in three matches (1877–1882).
*James Richmond (Paralympic footballer) (born 1980), British football player in the 2012 Paralympic Games
*James Richmond (Medal of Honor) (1843–1864), Union Army soldier and Medal of Honor recipient
